```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(urbnmapr)
library(urbnthemes)
library(sf)
# knitr options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
set_urbn_defaults(style = "map")
```

```{r}
counties_sf <- get_urbn_map(map = "counties", sf = TRUE)
states_sf <- get_urbn_map("states", sf = TRUE)

div_county_geo <- left_join(counties_sf, div_county, by = "county_fips")

div_county_geo %>%
  filter(state_name == "Florida") %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(mapping = aes(fill = n), color = "#ffffff", size = 0.05) +
  coord_sf(datum = NA) +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "blue", high = "red", na.value = NA, trans = "log") +
  labs(fill = "Count")
div_state <- 
  div_county %>% 
  group_by(StateAbbr) %>% 
  summarise(count = sum(n), na.rm = TRUE) %>% 
  rename("state_abbv" = "StateAbbr") %>% 
  left_join(states_sf, by = "state_abbv") %>% 
  st_as_sf(sf_column_name = "geometry")

div_state %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(mapping = aes(fill = count), color = "white", size = 0.05) +
  coord_sf(datum = NA) +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "blue", high = "red", na.value = NA, trans = "log") +
  labs(fill = "Count")
```
